official_title: Fatigue Reduction Diet in Survivors of Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphomas; a Preliminary Study
inclusion_criteria:
* Adult patients (18+) with Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) who have completed their upfront chemoimmunotherapy, and remained in remission for 2 years prior to enrollment
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 99 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Unable to provide consent or speak English
